We need to produce JSON with keys: summary, business_intent, keywords (list). Summarize class responsibility: ChatSettings creates chat settings that user can change. Provide methods: init, send, settings. So summary: class for managing chat configuration and sending messages. Business intent: allow users to customize chat behavior and send messages with those settings. Keywords: chat, settings, configuration, user preferences, send, helper, customization.

Make sure not to list method names verbatim? It says "Do NOT list method names verbatim." So we shouldn't include "send" or "settings" as keywords? Probably avoid method names. Use synonyms.

Let's craft JSON.assistantfinal{
  "summary": "A utility class that encapsulates configurable chat parameters and provides convenient operations to apply those parameters when communicating.",
  "business_intent": "Enable end‑users to personalize chat behavior—such as tone, language, or display options—and to transmit messages using the selected configuration.",
  "keywords": [
    "chat configuration",
    "user preferences",
    "customizable settings",
    "message transmission",
    "parameter management",
    "interactive communication"
  ]
}
